definition: (lit.) to wither in the light of day/(fig.) the bubble bursts as the reality becomes apparent (esp. of a much-anticipated first meeting with sb)/(of stocks) just as the favorable news is officially published, the stock price falls
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: As house prices fall, a huge amount of financial folly is being exposed.
sentences.chinese: 隨着房產價格下降，一大堆金融蠢話也見光死了。

definition: see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
water in a distant place is of little use in putting out a fire right here/(fig.) a slow remedy does not address the current emergency
pinyin: yuan3 shui3 jiu4 bu5 liao3 jin4 huo3

definition: to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5
